    Class Description
    Action
    An action.
    ActionContext
    Context for action calls.
    ActionCreationContext
    Creation context for Action annotated components.
    ActionFactory
    Low level interface to implement Action components.
    ActionHandler
    Low level interface for handling for action calls.
    AkkaServerless
    The AkkaServerless class is the main interface to configuring entities to deploy, and subsequently starting a local server which will expose these entities to the AkkaServerless Proxy Sidecar.
    AkkaServerlessAnnotation
    Mark annotation for all AkkaServerless annotations
    ClientActionContext
    Context that provides client actions, which include failing and forwarding.
    CloudEvent
    CloudEvent representation of Metadata.
    CommandContext
    An event sourced command context.
    CommandContext
    Context for handling a command.
    CommandContext<T>
    A value based entity command context.
    CommandHandler
    Marks a method as a command handler.
    CommandHandler
    Marks a method as a command handler.
    CommandHandler
    Marks a method on a value based entity as a command handler.
    Context
    Root class of all contexts.
    Effect
    An effect.
    EffectContext
    A context that allows instructing the proxy to perform a side effect.
    EntityContext
    Root context for all contexts that pertain to entities, that is, things that are addressable via an entity id.
    EntityFactory
    Entity factory for supporting DI environments.
    EntityId
    Annotation used to indicate that the annotated parameter accepts an entity id.
    EntityOptions
    Options used for configuring an entity.
    EventContext
    Context for an event.
    EventHandler
    Marks a method as an event handler.
    EventSourcedContext
    Root context for all event sourcing contexts.
    EventSourcedEntity
    An event sourced entity.
    EventSourcedEntityCreationContext
    Creation context for EventSourcedEntity annotated entities.
    EventSourcedEntityFactory
    Low level interface for handling events and commands on an entity.
    EventSourcedEntityHandler
    Low level interface for handling events and commands on an entity.
    EventSourcedEntityOptions
    Root entity options for all event sourcing entities.
    FailureReply<T>
    A failure reply.
    Flag
    A flag replicated data type.
    ForwardReply<T>
    A forward reply.
    GCounter
    A Grow-only Counter.
    GSet<T>
    A Grow-only Set.
    Handler
    An action service call handler.
    Jsonable
    Indicates that this class can be serialized to/from JSON.
    LogbackJsonLayout
    This Logback JSON layout uses the name `severity` (instead of `level`).
    LWWRegister<T>
    A Last-Write-Wins Register.
    LWWRegister.Clock
    A clock.
    LWWRegisterMap<K,​V>
    Convenience wrapper class for ORMap that uses LWWRegister's for values.
    MessageEnvelope<T>
    A message envelope.
    MessageReply<T>

    Transport specific metadata.
    Metadata.MetadataEntry
    A metadata entry.
    MetadataContext

    ORMap<K,​V extends ReplicatedData>

    PassivationStrategy

    PNCounter
    A Positive-Negative Counter.
    PNCounterMap<K>
    Convenience wrapper class for ORMap that uses PNCounter's for values.
    ReplicatedData
    Root interface for all data entries in Replicated Entities.
    ReplicatedDataFactory
    Factory for creating Replicated Data objects.
    ReplicatedEntity
    A replicated entity.
    ReplicatedEntityContext
    Root context for all Replicated Entity contexts.
    ReplicatedEntityCreationContext
    Context for Replicated Entity creation.
    ReplicatedEntityHandler
    Low level interface for handling Replicated Entity commands.
    ReplicatedEntityHandlerFactory
    Low level interface for handling commands for replicated entities.
    ReplicatedEntityOptions
    Root entity options for all Replicated Entities.
    Reply<T>
    A return type to allow returning forwards or failures, and attaching effects to messages.
    ServiceCall
    Represents a call to a service, performed either as a forward, or as an effect.
    ServiceCallFactory
    A service call factory.
    ServiceCallRef<T>
    A reference to a call on a service.
    Snapshot
    Marks a method as a snapshot method.
    SnapshotContext
    A snapshot context.
    SnapshotHandler
    Marks a method as a snapshot handler.
    StreamCancelledContext
    Context for a stream cancelled event.
    StreamedCommandContext<Output>
    Context for handling a streamed command.
    SubscriptionContext
    The context for a subscription, passed with every invocation of a StreamedCommandContext.onChange(Function) callback.
    UpdateHandler
    A view service call handler for transforming updates.
    UpdateHandlerContext
    Context for view update calls.
    ValueEntity
    A value based entity.
    ValueEntityContext
    Root context for all value based entity contexts.
    ValueEntityCreationContext
    Creation context for ValueEntity annotated entities.
    ValueEntityFactory
    Low level interface for handling commands on a value based entity.
    ValueEntityHandler
    Low level interface for handling commands on a value based entity.
    ValueEntityOptions
    Root entity options for all value based entities.
    View
    Transformation of incoming messages and previous state to updated state can be implemented in a class annotated with @View.
    ViewContext
    Context for views.
    ViewCreationContext
    Creation context for View annotated entities.
    ViewFactory
    Low level interface for handling messages in views.
    ViewUpdateHandler
    Low level interface for handling messages on views.
    Vote
    A Vote replicated data type.
    WriteConsistency
    Write consistency setting for replication of state updates for Replicated Entities.
